name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with egg, bean sprouts, green onions, and crushed peanuts. Choice of tofu or chicken.

name: Thai Fried Rice
description: Jasmine rice stir-fried with egg, onions, tomatoes, and Thai seasoning. Choice of protein.

name: Red Curry
description: Spicy red curry with coconut milk, bamboo shoots, bell peppers, and basil leaves. Served with rice.

name: Thai Spring Rolls (4pc)
description: Crispy vegetable spring rolls served with sweet chili dipping sauce.

name: Thai Iced Tea
description: Sweet and creamy Thai black tea served over ice with milk.
